attributes.action: Let England, Wales and Northern Ireland have a vote on Scottish Independence
attributes.additional_details:
Relocate all naval and government establishments away from Scotland.
No subsidies going forward.
No use of the Pound,
Boarder control.
Promotion of a whiskey industry in the rest of the U,K.
Treating, in all respects, Scotland as a foreign nation.
Regions and Isles of Scotland can vote to stay within the U.K.
attributes.background:
We are sick and tired of the SNP

Let Northern Ireland, Wales and England vote on Scottish Independence.
